name: Lupus
title: Lupus
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a diagnosis of lupus (lupus erythematosus).),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis. ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with diagnosis codes for systemic, discoid, and drug-induced systemic lupus erythematosus. This is a grouping of ICD-9-CM, ICD-10-CM and SNOMED CT codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
